title: Bugsplat in loading screen, then I cant log in because of known issues and my team remakes
body:
Alright Ill repost it here, so.. I lost 38 lp today just because of that coding problem (first a teammate disconnected and I assume couldnt reconnect because of it, now this).. 
Bad luck or is there any way you get compensation for that?

replies.body:
Sorry to hear about LP losses.  :(  I can't restore any LP, but I definitely want to resolve the bugsplatting and get you back in-game.  Cases like this are usually caused by bad drivers, but it can be bad game files too.  Run through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.

You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a repair as well.  I hope it helps!
Just had this happen as well. Is there a way to have this not counted as a left game as it was due to things beyond my control?
same thing just happened to me its so frustrating i lost my promos because of it.
Doubt they can do anything...  You should cee if they can remove it from the leaverbuster system though...
